content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: As a highly sought-after apartment in a prime location, I must ensure I receive a fitting return on my investment. May I propose an initial rental price of 1200 Euros per month? Yi-Nuo Wang, I believe this is a fair starting point for our negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price, Mr. Schmidt. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I believe the market rate and the apartment's features might be more reasonable. I'll need to research further and gather more information before proceeding with the discussions.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because further research on market rates and apartment features seems necessary to reach a more acceptable agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
